channel.title: Error help

item.title: Error help
item.dc:creator: @Killer_Coder Killer Coder
item.description:
@Killer_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Killed By Squirrel, post:3, topic:112758”][quote author=javis link=topic=161213.msg1510522#msg1510522 date=1182161503]
for the illegal start of expresion just add a } above

public boolean resetattacknpc( ) {

in your client.java

[/quote]
Here’s a tip: You always add as many }'s at the end of a code as the amount of {'s you have within that code.[/quote]

thanks for the tip dude

Read full topic

item.title: Error help
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

How long did it take you to write that lmfao. Anyway, it means you added too many }.

Read full topic

item.title: Error help
item.dc:creator: @Killed_By_Squirrel Killed By Squirrel
item.description:
@Killed_By_Squirrel wrote:

[quote=“javis, post:2, topic:112758”]for the illegal start of expresion just add a } above

public boolean resetattacknpc( ) {

in your client.java[/quote]
Here’s a tip: You always add as many }'s at the end of a code as the amount of {'s you have within that code.

item.title: Error help
item.dc:creator: @saw2 saw2
item.description:
@saw2 wrote:

                                   actionTimer = 4;
                                    server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].animNumber = server.npcHandler.GetNPCBlockAnim(server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType);
                                    }
			}
			
			return true;
		}
	}
        }

else {
sendMessage(“You can’t attack a player’s summoned npc!”);
}
return false;
}
public boolean ResetAttackNPC() {
if (attacknpc > -1 && attacknpc < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs) {
server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].IsUnderAttack = false;
}
IsAttackingNPC = false;
attacknpc = -1;
resetAnimation();
pEmote = playerSE;
faceNPC = 65535;
faceNPCupdate = true;
return true;
}
public void ManipulateDirection() {
//playerMD = misc.direction(absX, absY, skillX, skillY);
if (playerMD != -1) {
//playerMD >>= 1;
updateRequired = true;
dirUpdateRequired = true;
}
}

public int GetNPCID(int coordX, int coordY) {

this is the area the error is in please to try to point it out

error:public boolean resetattacknpc( ) {

help please!!!
